column6:
Image is running as root user when started without explicit user selection.
Image ###IMAGE###
Cluster ###CLUSTER###
Namespace ###NAMESPACE###
column7:
Change user to a non-root user during image building.
Example in Dockerfile:
USER 1011
Example with builadh:
buildah config [...] --user 1011
column8:
Greater blast radius when container is overtaken by an attacker.
Worst case: Attacker gains root access to host machine (Container Escape).
